question: Please analyze this URL https://tamaraax.de/
thought: I need to start by accessing the URL to obtain a status code. The website is accessible, so I need to further analyze the content to determine if it is a scam site. The website https://tamaraax.de/ seems to have unusually low prices and claims of free, as well as a wide variety of products at heavily discounted prices. I need to check the WHOIS information for the domain to see if there are any red flags. The WHOIS information for the domain tamaraax.de does not provide any registrant, admin, tech, or billing information. This lack of transparency is a red flag. Based on the unusually low prices and claims of free, as well as the lack of transparency in the WHOIS information, I can determine that https://tamaraax.de/ is a scam website. {

answer.reason: The website has unusually low prices and claims of free as well as a lack of transparency in the WHOIS information.

context: I want you to act as a professional scam website detection expert. You are tasked with analyzing the content of URLs given to you to determine if the URL is a scam website or not. Scam websites have the following features. 1. Unusually low prices and claims of free. 2. Claims to be able to get an amount of money that is generally not possible. 3. Texts that target human psychological weaknesses exist on websites. 4. Information on non-existent companies. 5. Handling different products from common e-commerce websites. 6. Inquiry phone number and email address are not appropriate for business use. 7. Privacy of customer information notation is ambiguous. 8. Payment methods are not common and are unusual. 9. The information listed has not been updated.
